install.name: System - MobileESP for Joomla
install.author: Robert Gerald Porter, Anthony Hand
install.copyright: Joomla Component authored by Robert Gerald Porter, The MobileESP Project is Copyright (C) 2010-2011 Anthony Hand
install.description: MobileESP plugin for Joomla, detects smartphones to redirect to web app site or specific landing URL in Joomla.

param.name: appService
param.label: Mobile App Service
param.description: Select which mobile app service you are using.
param.option: Weever App (use settings from Weever Apps component)

param.name: forwardingEnabled
param.label: Mobile Forwarding
param.description: Forward any visitors to specified URL

param.name: forwardingUrl
param.label: Forwarding URL
param.description: URL to forward selected mobile users to.

param.name: devicesForwarded
param.label: Device Detection Functions Used
param.description: A comma-seperated list of detection functions from mobileesp/mdetect.php to run. If any one of them are true, the device will forward to the forwarding URL.

param.name: webkitOnly
param.label: WebKit only
param.description: Forward only when WebKit browser is detected?
